actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the Miami Area Unified School District Number 40, Miami, Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey specified land to the Miami Area Unified School District Numbered 40, Miami, Arizona.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the Miami Area Unified School District Number 40, Miami, Arizona.
